It's been a while since I've played TF2 but this game is one of the best class-based shooters ever made. I've clocked close to 1,000 hours on this game and the only regret was that I spent a lot of time on one server. I'm too busy to sink a lot of hours in, like before but the game still holds a special place in my library.

The game is really good, and the commuinty servers are so helpful. :)

edit: I've gotten better at the game, and its still really fun! won my first comp, finished my first tour, and the game is still really fun! i can see why it is regarded as one of the best games of all time.

Edit 2: Holy shit have I played this game for that long? 450 hours? This game is a blessing and a curse. The blessing being Demoman and community servers, and the curse being no updates and those that shall not be named. 1 year. I first played this game on a work laptop. playing at 20 fps. And I was happy. No tryhards, no bots, no edgy sniper mains. Just servers full of demomains swordfighting and hoovys giving sanviches. It was nice. after putting some money aside for a good pc, I played TF2. My first thought was that this game is beautiful. PLEASE just go into an empty server and just look around. Mvm is one of the best games mods ever. My favorite moment in any fps game was when i joined a random server and just laughed my ass off with 5 other random people. Demoman is one of,  if not the most versatile classes in the game. from being pipe jesus, to being a knight in shinning armor. Dustbowl will always be my home away from home. my first strange, a polar pullover will be my baby forever. Tf2 is one of the best games of all time. Go play it.
Made sex not enjoyable I do not recommend

Despite all the bots and problems this game is facing it is still a fun game to play. It has a decent community and a lot of good people who still play to this day. It may seem like a dead game from the outside, but is very alive when you get into it.
